title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       Welcome to William Howard Taft National Historic Site        NPS / Tom Engberg   Jump to Quick Links section.  The park is open daily from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m.  It is closed on Thanksgiving Day, December 25th, and January 1st.  Current information on visiting hours, group tours, and programs is available by writing or calling in advance of your visit. Begin your visit at The Taft Education Center adjacent to the birthplace home. The center offers brochures, a gift shop, interactive exhibits, and orientation film. Staff members conduct tours of historically furnished rooms in the house. Other rooms display exhibits on Taft's early years and his political career. William Howard Taft National Historic Site is a fee free park site.       Quick Links   Basic Park Information   Directions & Transportation   Eating & Sleeping   Places to Go   Things to Do   Calendar   Safety   Accessibility   Nearby Attractions
